channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8171] Tez and Vectorized Reduce doesn't create scratch columns
item.description:
This query fails with ArrayIndexOutofBound exception in the reducer.

create table varchar_3 (
  field varchar(25)
) stored as orc;

insert into table varchar_3 select cint from alltypesorc limit 10;
item.summary: Tez and Vectorized Reduce doesn't create scratch columns

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12669578

1. The vectorized row batch is being constructed for different tags, but all are using same set of scratch columns. I am not sure if we really need multiple tags here.
  2. The indentation can be improved in a few places, particularly log statements.

Got rid of the unnecessary tags in ReduceRecordProcessor.
Not sure which LOG indentations you are seeing.

..LOG indentations...

I meant the log lines are longer than 100 chars.

+1 for the patch. LGTM
